name: Ignite & Flight
description:
Far away there is a fractured world of sky islands. Clouds dance over grass, rivers flow out into the heavens and volcanos erupt into the atmosphere. It's a lost world where mythic and magic are around every corner and legends roam the lands. It's a world of wonder calling for you to explore it.

Your aim is to chill out and explore the skies with our Phoenix friend! Be adventurous and fly close to islands to gain points. Look out for fireballs, they will transport you to a new world where points are earned faster. What will be your highscore?

Made for Phoenix Jam by Ben Morris and Meg Christopher.
